title: cf.tls\_client\_auth.cert\_issuer\_serial
content:
`cf.tls_client_auth.cert_issuer_serial` String

Serial number of the direct issuer of the certificate in the request.

This field is only filled in if the request includes a client certificate for [mTLS authentication](https://developers.cloudflare.com/ssl/client-certificates/enable-mtls/).
